ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 14 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon D600 24.3 MP CMOS FX-Format Digital SLR Camera (Body) - Nikon 24-85mm f/3.5-4.5G ED VR AF-S Nikkor Zoom Lens - 72mm UV Protection Filter
2 (two) 32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Cards - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL15 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Nikon Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus Digital Grey Card Set - Focus 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D600 24.3 MP CMOS FX-Format Digital SLR Camera with 24-85mm f/3.5-4.5G ED VR AF-S Nikkor Lens + Nikon Gadget Bag + EN-EL15 Battery + 10pc Bundle 64GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
